findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (10%)
findings.description: The contract owner has limited authority to increase fees beyond a certain percentage (10%).

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner, but there's no mechanism to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has limited authority to increase the amount of liquidity taken by the development wallet, ensuring that it does not exceed a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling tokens.
